data.text:
Cecil E. Turner OBITUARY

TURNER, CECIL E.; of Clarkston; joined in eternity with his daughter, Sharon on May 2, 2011; at 84 years of age. Loving husband of Alma; beloved father of Nancy (Chuck) Lauinger, Paula (Steve) Wilson, Mark (Laurie) Turner, Denise (Robert) Tarchalski and Carole (Mike) Hanel; also survived by 15 grandchildren; and 16 great grandchildren. A Private Family Committal with full military honors will take place at Great Lakes National Cemetery in Holly. Arrangements entrusted to COATS FUNERAL HOME, Clarkston. To send private condolence to the family go to www.CoatsFuneralHome.com/Obituaries
